select
from user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY reg_count DESC

select
from user where user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ORDER BY reg_count DESC

from user where validation_result = #{validation,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY reg_count DESC

from user where mobile_no = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY reg_count DESC

from user where mobile_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ORDER BY reg_count DESC

select

select

select

select
from user where date_create >= #{begin} AND date_create < #{end} ORDER BY reg_count DESC

from user where reg_uid = #{reguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY reg_count DESC

from user ORDER BY reg_count DESC
